November 26-27, 1973 N.Y. Rehearsal New York rehearsals with new recruit Prakash John (George Clinton / Parliament / Funkadelic) on bass for two days. Plans are provisionally in place to professionally record a show using the Record Plant Remote Recording Truck less than a month later. The day that everyone had been working towards arrived and the two shows on 1973.12.21 at Howard Stein's Academy of Music, New York were both recorded.
